data.instruction_text:
%{i}. ROOF SIDE:
1) All modules on the %{i}. Roof side must be visible
2) Align modules to existing alignments (roof ridge, verge, ...)
3) Maintain distance between modules and:

  - Neighboring house according to country-specific building regulations
  - Align interfering surfaces and verge symmetrically
  - At least 1 cm between the modules for thermal expansion
  - Eaves at least 15 cm, verge at least 3 cm and flush with the ridge
  - Solar system and the lightning protection system depending on the lightning protection class

4) When integrating the system into the lightning protection system: lay out equipotential bonding with 16 mm and install combined conductors 1 and 2 - >approval by lightning protection experts
5) Use clean gloves during transportation and installation to avoid soiling
data.title: General view of modules roof side %{i}
data.question_text: General view of modules %{i}. Roof side
